CLARA_TOKENS_YOUTUBE.description: Token used for searching on YouTube.

CLARA_TOKENS_SOUNDCLOUD.description: Token used for the SoundCloud API.

CLARA_TOKENS_IBSEARCH.description: Token used for the IBSearch API.

CLARA_TOKENS_OSU.description: Token used for the osu! API.

CLARA_TOKENS_SAUCENAO.description: Token used for the SauceNAO API.

CLARA_TOKENS_NASA.description: Token used for Nasa's APOD API.

CLARA_TOKENS_TWITCH.description: Token used for the Twitch API.

CLARA_BOTLIST_TOKENS_DBL.description: Token for sending stats to discordbots.org.

CLARA_BOTLIST_TOKENS_DBOTS.description: Token for sending stats to bots.discord.pw.

CLARA_DEVELOPMENT_DEBUG.description: Whether or not to print stack traces to the console.

CLARA_DEVELOPMENT_PROMISE_WARNINGS.description: Whether or not to have warnings from Bluebird get printed.

CLARA_GENERAL_OWNERID.description: ID of the bot owner. Used to run owner-only commands.

CLARA_GENERAL_TOKEN.description: Token used to log into Discord with.

CLARA_GENERAL_MAINPREFIX.description: Initial, static prefix of the bot.

CLARA_GENERAL_MAXSHARDS.description: Maximum number of shards to run. Only change this if you have a really big bot.

CLARA_DISCORD_GAME_URL.description: Twitch URL to show as streaming on Discord.

CLARA_DISCORD_GAME_TYPE.description: Game type to use on Discord. Will be overriden if a URL is specified above.

CLARA_DISCORD_GAME_NAME.description:: Name of the game to use on Discord. Supports variables {{version}}, {{guilds}}, {{channels}}, {{prefix}} and {{users}}.
